name: Spades (itch) (yarray)
description:
CONTROLS

  • 1 Player mode: arrow keys to change directions (just like in snake games!)
  • 2 Players mode:
    • Player left: w, a, s, d to change directions
    • Player right: arrow Keys to change directions
  • Joysticks: arrow keys
  • Space when game ends to start the next play (joystick triangle or X)
  • Escape to pause and toggle menu in game (joystick circle or B)
  • In Title and Menu: up & down to navigate, space to confirm selection (joystick up & down, triangle or X)

GAME & RULES

Earn as many points as possible before timeout, and avoid sudden death.

The gaming space contains the following types that the spades can interact with:

  • Sky(cyan): the safe area, no effect
  • Soil(black): the thick wall around, can be digged to generate Gap. Digging soil will turn the Spade into "digging" mode (turn to green).
  • Gap(purple): the purple area after Soil is digged. Touching Gap in digging mode will cause the spade die.
  • Fake food(orange): randomly generate Real Food in Gap when eaten. If there's no Gap in the board, simply disappear when eaten.
  • Real Food(yellow): score 1 point when eaten. Spade will get 2 points if in digging mode.

HISTORY

It is an vastly enhanced version of Spade, a game made for TriJam #50 in 3 hours.

The enhanced part includes the following:

  1. Two player mode
  2. Optmized gaming rule
  3. Sci-Fi style visual effect
  4. Background music and sfx
  5. Various bug fixes
